name: Skullcrusher SZ-bar
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.
2. Hold an SZ-bar over your chest, with your arms fully extended above your head.
3. Lower the bar to a position directly above your forehead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
4. Then, explosively press the bar upwards towards the ceiling, straightening your arms completely.
5. Avoid arching your back or using momentum to lift the weight.
6. Contract your core muscles and maintain a stable torso throughout the movement.
7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Skullcrusher SZ-bar is upper body exercise targeting shoulder muscles, performed by lowering an SZ-bar from overhead to over the forehead then explosively pressing it upwards.
